ArticleTitle.sentence: The role of BSAP (Pax-5) in B-cell development.

event.clue: The role of BSAP (Pax-5) in B-cell development.
The role of BSAP (Pax-5) in B-cell development.

AbstractText.sentence: The hierarchy of transcriptional control in B-cell development has recently been analyzed by targeted gene inactivation in the mouse.

event.clue: The hierarchy of transcriptional control in B-cell development has recently been analyzed by targeted gene inactivation in the mouse.

AbstractText.sentence: In this manner, the paired box containing gene Pax-5, encoding the B cell specific transcription factor BSAP, has been shown to play a key role in early B lymphopoiesis.

event.clue: In this manner, the paired box containing gene Pax-5, encoding the B cell specific transcription factor BSAP, has been shown to play a key role in early B lymphopoiesis.

AbstractText.sentence: Other experimental strategies have implicated BSAP in the control of cell proliferation, isotype switching and transcription of the immunoglobulin heavy-chain gene at late stages of B-cell differentiation.

event.clue: Other experimental strategies have implicated BSAP in the control of cell proliferation, isotype switching and transcription of the immunoglobulin heavy-chain gene at late stages of B-cell differentiation.
